mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.attr_id AS "attributeInfo.id", ai.name AS "attributeInfo.name", a.attr_id AS "attrId", a.object_name AS "objectName", a.object_id AS "objectId", a.value AS "value", a.code AS "code", a.status AS "status", a.create_id AS "createBy.id", a.create_time AS "createDate", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateBy.id", a.update_time AS "updateDate"
LEFT JOIN sys_attribute_info ai on ai.id=a.attr_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_attribute_value( id, attr_id, object_name, object_id, value, status, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{attributeInfo.id}, #{objectName}, #{objectId}, #{value}, ${@com.wanhutong.backend.common.persistence.BaseEntity@DEL_FLAG_NORMAL}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{uVersion}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} ) on duplicate KEY UPDATE value = #{value}
mapper.update: UPDATE sys_attribute_value SET attr_id = #{attributeInfo.id}, object_name = #{objectName}, object_id = #{objectId}, value = #{value}, code = #{code}, create_time = #{createDate}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateBy.id}, update_time = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
